state: Welcome to another exciting game of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First, it would be good if you could make an attempt to take a trip south. With that done, make an effort to venture east. Once you get around to doing that, go south. And then, go to the east. Then, make an effort to head north. And then, head east. And then, venture east. That done, take a trip north. Next, attempt to venture north. After that, attempt to go north. After that, go north. If you can get around to doing that, move north. Next, venture west. If you can finish that, make an attempt to head north. And then, lift the coin from the floor of the dish-pit. That's it! -= Study =- You find yourself in an usual kind of place. That is to say, you're in a study. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Study =-0/1
next_state: -= Cookhouse =- Well, here we are in the cookhouse. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cookhouse =-0/2
